briefTitle: Treatment of Latent TB Infection for Jailed Persons

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Laboratory Test or Clinical Judgment Resulting in the Need to Stop Study Medication
outcomeMeasures.description: Liver function tests were taken at regular intervals and clinical symptoms were reviewed at regular intervals in both study groups. On the basis of these tests and examinations, physicians determined whether the study drug needed to be stopped.
